means: 查理曼大帝(742-814，世称 Charles the Great或Charles I,768-814为法兰克王，800-814为西罗马帝国皇帝)

sentence.Network_en: Charlemagne was crowned Emperor on Christmas Day 800 AD.
sentence.Network_cn: 查里曼于公元800年圣诞节加冕为皇帝.

sentence.Network_en: Charlemagne, another great ruler, found it handier to grip his sword with his left hand.
sentence.Network_cn: 另一位伟大的统治者查理曼发现自己左手握剑比右手握剑更加灵便.

sentence.Network_en: I can never forgive Charlemagne for introducing clocks into Western civilization.
sentence.Network_cn: 我决不能饶恕查理曼大帝之将时钟引进西方文明这一件事情.
